title: Linear Equations Quiz
description: Quiz covering basic linear equations and solving techniques
instructions: Show all work for full credit. Use pencil only. No calculators allowed.

title: Graphing Functions Test
description: Test on linear and quadratic function graphing
instructions: Graph paper provided. Show all steps clearly. Partial credit available.

title: Midterm Examination
description: Comprehensive midterm covering all topics from semester start
instructions: Scientific calculator permitted. Review all chapters 1-5. Bring ID.

title: Poetry Analysis Assignment
description: Analyze selected poems using literary devices and themes
instructions: Minimum 500 words. MLA format required. Submit typed copy.

title: Character Development Essay
description: Essay on character development in assigned novel
instructions: 750-1000 words. Use specific examples from text. Cite page numbers.

title: Cell Structure Lab Report
description: Laboratory report on microscopic observation of cell structures
instructions: Include labeled diagrams. Submit within 48 hours of lab session.

title: Genetics Quiz
description: Quiz on Mendelian genetics and inheritance patterns
instructions: Punnett squares may be required. Show probability calculations.

title: Ecosystem Project
description: Research project on local ecosystem and environmental factors
instructions: Include field observations, data collection, and analysis. Presentation required.

title: Ancient Civilizations Test
description: Test covering Mesopotamia, Egypt, and Indus Valley civilizations
instructions: Map identification included. Study timeline handout.

title: Renaissance Research Paper
description: Research paper on significant Renaissance figure or development
instructions: Minimum 3 sources required. Chicago citation style. 1200-1500 words.

title: Fitness Assessment
description: Physical fitness evaluation including cardio and strength tests
instructions: Wear appropriate athletic attire. Bring water bottle. Warm-up included.

title: Sports Skills Demonstration
description: Practical demonstration of learned sports skills and techniques
instructions: Choose 3 sports to demonstrate proficiency. Safety equipment provided.

title: Still Life Drawing
description: Charcoal drawing of arranged still life objects
instructions: Use provided materials only. Focus on shading and proportion.

title: Music Theory Exam
description: Examination on scales, intervals, and basic harmony
instructions: Staff paper provided. Piano available for reference during exam.

title: Chemical Reactions Lab
description: Laboratory experiment on types of chemical reactions
instructions: Safety goggles required. Complete data tables and analysis questions.
